text: Leonard Joseph Fontaine (February 25, 1948 â€“ March 25, 2019) was a Canadian professional ice hockey player. He played as a right winger. He played for the Detroit Red Wings in the National Hockey League (NHL). He was born in Quebec City, Quebec. Fontaine died on March 25, 2019 at his home in Brigden, Ontario. He was 71. ==References== ==Other websites== * Len Fontaine at Hockey- Reference.com Category:1948 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Detroit Red Wings players Category:Ice hockey people from Quebec Category:Sportspeople from Quebec City
title: Len Fontaine
